hero.headline: Increase Revenue. Reduce Churn.
hero.description: GymPulse is the operating system for growth-driven fitness businesses — combining sales automation, retention intelligence and performance metrics in one platform.

problem.title: Most gyms don’t lose members loudly.
problem.subtitle: They lose them quietly — because follow-up is inconsistent, churn risk is invisible, and decisions are made without clear performance signals.
problem.calloutTitle: Fitness businesses don’t fail from lack of passion.
problem.calloutText: They fail from lack of systems. GymPulse turns retention and growth into a repeatable process.

cards.c1Desc: Leads go cold and trials don’t convert because contact isn’t immediate or consistent.
cards.c2Desc: Members disengage weeks before canceling — but teams don’t see the signals early enough.
cards.c3Title: No clarity on what to fix
cards.c3Desc: Without a single performance view, priorities become guesswork and revenue leaks monthly.

how.title: A simple loop: measure → improve → grow.
how.subtitle: Everything becomes clear when the system tells you what to do next.

steps.s1Desc: Centralize signals: leads, visits, churn risk, attendance and revenue trends.
steps.s2Desc: Turn insights into actions: follow-ups, reactivation campaigns and tasks.
steps.s3Desc: Track impact weekly and raise your GymPulse Score™ over time.

how.note: GymPulse is built for clarity: one score, clear next actions, and measurable impact.

score.title: Know your gym’s health in one number (0–100).
score.subtitle: A proprietary metric that summarizes growth + retention signals into a single, actionable view.

bullets.b1: Spot churn risk early and act before cancellations happen.
bullets.b2: Prioritize what moves revenue and retention — with measurable impact.

features.title: Built to drive predictable growth.
features.subtitle: Not a management system. A growth engine for fitness businesses.

cards.c1Desc: Instant follow-up, smart pipelines and consistent lead handling.
cards.c2Desc: Churn risk alerts, inactivity detection and reactivation workflows.
cards.c3Desc: One place to track what matters: revenue, attendance and retention.
